events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit properly and I need a refund.
The issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to size issues.
Assigning the case to Refund Specialist Team to handle the customer's return and refund request efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your jacket return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can begin processing your refund?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is too tight around the shoulders, so I want to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund once we receive the returned jacket. I'll send you a prepaid shipping label to make the return process easier.
Thanks for the quick response and for providing a prepaid shipping label. That makes it much easier for me.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Once you mail the jacket back, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the shipping label and if you need any further assistance with your return.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the jacket yesterday. I appreciate your help throughout this process.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and we are closing this case now. Please reach out if you need assistance in the future.
We have sent you a brief survey to gather your feedback on the refund and return experience with our support team.
